code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{FaTimesCircle}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PaymentCancel=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-16 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-orange-50 border border-orange-200 text-orange-800 rounded-lg p-8 inline-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTimesCircle,{className:"text-5xl text-orange-500 mx-auto mb-6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Payment Cancelled"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xl mb-6",children:"Your payment has been cancelled and no charges were made."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-8",children:"You can try again whenever you're ready, or contact our support team if you need assistance."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/subscription'),className:"bg-primary-600 text-white py-3 px-8 rounded-lg hover:bg-primary-700",children:"Try Again"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/dashboard'),className:"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 py-3 px-8 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-300",children:"Go to Dashboard"})]})]})});};export default PaymentCancel;
